Main.title: Welcome to Sarah’s Portfolio
Main.subtitle: I’m a Computer Science Specialist student at the University of Toronto. I’m striving to become a creative developer and designer.

About.title: About Me
About.passions: Hey, I'm Sarah, an eager student with a passion for blending code and creativity. At the start of university, I entered the dynamic world of computer science where I found joy in transforming code into creative and user-friendly solutions. But my journey goes beyond the screen — I'm equally captivated by the world of design, constantly seeking ways to infuse aesthetics into my projects. When I'm not immersed in work, you'll likely find me experimenting with new recipes, sports, and games with my friends.
About.workExperience: My professional journey has been a colorful palette, with work experiences ranging from full-stack development at a start-up, web design at a work-study, data engineering at Wattpad, and currently to more full-stack engineering at Mozilla. I’m always looking forward to learning something new. After graduating, I am seeking an opportunity to contribute more of my visual and design skills into technical projects. Let’s connect, work together, and create something extraordinary!
